channel.title: config on CDS - Continuous Delivery Service
channel.description: Recent content in config on CDS - Continuous Delivery Service

item.title: check
item.description: engine config check Check CDS configuration file Synopsis $ engine config check engine config check SEE ALSO engine config - Manage CDS Configuration

item.title: new
item.description: engine config new CDS configuration file assistant Synopsis Generate the whole configuration file $ engine config new > conf.toml you can compose your file configuration this will generate a file configuration containing api and hatchery:local µService $ engine config new api hatchery:local For advanced usage, Debug and Tracing section can be generated as: $ engine config new debug tracing [µService(s)…] All options $ engine config new [debug] [tracing] [api] [hatchery:local] [hatchery:marathon] [hatchery:openstack] [hatchery:swarm] [hatchery:vsphere] [elasticsearch] [hooks] [vcs] [repositories] [migrate]
